2000.context: Booking Holdings Inc. is a online travel and reservation platform focused on Booking.com, Priceline, Kayak, and OpenTable. Priceline known for name-your-own-price model for travel.

2005.context: Booking Holdings Inc. is a online travel and reservation platform focused on Booking.com, Priceline, Kayak, and OpenTable. Acquired Booking.com for $133M. European hotel booking dominance began.

2010.context: Booking Holdings Inc. is a online travel and reservation platform focused on Booking.com, Priceline, Kayak, and OpenTable. Booking.com became largest brand. Acquired Kayak. Mobile booking growing.

competitors.name: Expedia
competitors.notes: Major OTA competitor with Hotels.com, Hotwire brands

competitors.notes: OTA competing for US travel bookings

competitors.notes: Early OTA pioneer owned by Sabre

competitors.notes: Travel reviews site adding booking capabilities

competitors.name: Hotels.com
competitors.notes: Hotel booking site owned by Expedia

competitors.name: Kayak
competitors.notes: Travel metasearch later acquired by Priceline

2015.context: Booking Holdings Inc. is a online travel and reservation platform focused on Booking.com, Priceline, Kayak, and OpenTable. Expanded beyond hotels to homes and experiences. OpenTable acquisition.

competitors.name: Expedia
competitors.notes: Major OTA rival with Hotels.com, Trivago stake

2020.context: Booking Holdings Inc. is a online travel and reservation platform focused on Booking.com, Priceline, Kayak, and OpenTable. COVID-19 devastated travel. Focused on connected trip vision.

competitors.name: Expedia Group
competitors.notes: Major OTA competitor with Expedia, Vrbo, Hotels.com brands

competitors.name: Airbnb
competitors.notes: Alternative accommodations benefiting from preference for private stays

competitors.notes: Hotel chains pushing direct bookings with loyalty benefits

competitors.name: Trip.com Group
competitors.notes: Chinese OTA with global expansion ambitions

competitors.name: Hopper
competitors.notes: Mobile-first travel app with price prediction

2024.context: Booking Holdings Inc. is a online travel and reservation platform focused on Booking.com, Priceline, Kayak, and OpenTable. Travel recovery strong. AI-powered trip planning. Competing with Airbnb, Expedia.

competitors.name: Expedia Group
competitors.notes: Major OTA competitor with Expedia, Vrbo, Hotels.com

competitors.name: Google Travel
competitors.notes: Travel search and direct booking threatening OTA model

competitors.notes: Reviews platform with Viator experiences business

competitors.name: Hopper

competitors.name: Hotel Direct Channels
competitors.notes: Hotels driving direct bookings with loyalty and best rate guarantees

competitors.name: Tripadvisor
competitors.notes: Travel guidance platform with booking capabilities

2025.context: Booking Holdings Inc. is a online travel and reservation platform focused on Booking.com, Priceline, Kayak, and OpenTable. Connected trip platform. AI concierge and personalized travel recommendations.
